        public static final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.CharSequence> split(java.lang.CharSequence pText,
                                                char pCharacter)
        Split a CharSequence by a Character, i.e. Split lines by using '\n'.
        Same behavior as String.split("" + pCharacter); .
